data.title: Amazon stock keeps going up: Can anything stop its rise?
data.text:
Jeff Bezos is already a billion dollars richer than he was when he was grilled by Congress two days ago.

data.title: Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos is $7.6 billion richer after earnings report

data.title: Retail Brands Scramble To Expand Into New Online Marketplaces, But Amazon Still Wins On Growth Features
data.text: Here is a non-exhaustive list of marketing features that Amazon has built which can create enormous upside for brands that invest in selling there. With Amazon’s 38% share of ecommerce sales, maximizing every one of these marketing features should be a priority before looking elsewhere for growth.

data.title: A day after Congressional grilling, big tech stocks add $250 billion
data.text: What was poised to be a bruising week for Big Tech has instead turned into a major windfall. The biggest names in Silicon Valley reported shockingly strong profits late Thursday, one day after their bosses weathered an intense grilling on Capitol Hill from lawmakers who questioned whether their power and influence was out of control.
